materials: Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #2 (Color HDPE); Aerosol Spray Cans; Aluminum Cans; Glass (Blue); Glass (Brown); Brown Paper Bags; Brush; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Cardboard; Cell Phones; Glass (Clear); Computer Monitors; Computer Paper; Computer (Recycling); Cooking Oil; Electronics; Ferrous Metals (Steel or Iron); Glass (Green); Inkjet Printer Cartridges; Large Household Appliances; Leaves; Magazines; Paper (Mixed); Newspapers; Latex Paint; Wood Pallets; Phone books; Batteries (Rechargeable); Televisions; Tin or Steel Cans; Laser Toner Cartridges; Used Tires; Office Paper; Unused Paper; MP3 Players; Microwaves; Computer Peripherals; Air Conditioners; Refrigerators; VCRs; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Macon County Recycling centers accept recyclable materials and personal HOUSEHOLD solid waste ONLY (defined as trash from kitchens, bathrooms, dens, etc. but NOT INCLUDING construction materials, hazardous wastes, liquid wastes or materials from commercial entities, even if located in a home). 
Commercial wastes MUST be taken to the landfill in Franklin or to the transfer station in Highlands on Rich Gap Road.
